Private Events
Let our team handle every detail, from customized menus to premium bottle service and exclusive seating. Whether you want an intimate gathering or a full-scale celebration, Mangoâs offers private and semi-private spaces tailored to your needs. Elevate your event with high-energy performances, tropical cocktails, and an atmosphere that keeps the party going all night long.

Mangoâs Tropical CafÃ© South Beach welcomes Executive Chef Byron Rubio to lead a bold new culinary era. With a background at world-class restaurants Chef Rubio is reimagining Mangoâs menu with refined, farm-to-table flavors inspired by Miamiâs vibrant culture. Guests can indulge in elevated dishes like Poached Lobster Tail, USDA Prime Ribeye, and decadent desserts, all crafted to complement Mangoâs iconic nightlife and entertainment. This transformation cements Mangoâs as the ultimate destination for unforgettable dining and world-class performances.

Corporate Events
Elevate your corporate event with an experience that goes beyond the ordinary. Mangoâs offers a unique blend of upscale dining, top-tier entertainment, and a vibrant atmosphere that keeps guests engaged from start to finish. Whether you're hosting a networking reception, an awards gala, or a company holiday party, our dedicated team ensures flawless execution with tailored menus, premium cocktails, and seamless AV capabilities. Treat your team and clients to an event thatâs as dynamic and exciting as your business.
